articles.title: Putin agreed to let U.S., Europe offer NATO-style protections for Ukraine, Trump envoy says - CBS News
articles.description: Special U.S. envoy Steve Witkoff says Russian leader Vladimir Putin agreed to allow the U.S. and Europe to offer Ukraine a security guarantee resembling NATO's collective defense mandate.
articles.content: Washington — Russia's Vladimir Putin agreed at his summit with President Trump to allow the U.S. and its European allies to offer Ukraine a security guarantee resembling NATO's collective defense man… [+5269 chars]
